pattern.name: Nominal change
pattern.description: Count of changes of a nominal attribute in time.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: WITH intermediate AS ( SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , @nominalColumn AS nowValue , LAG(@nominalColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @baseId, @baseDate ORDER BY @timeColumn) AS lagValue FROM @propagatedTable ) SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , sum(CASE WHEN nowValue <> lagValue THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "@columnName" FROM intermediate GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
